hero.title: Transform Your Recruitment Process
hero.subtitle: AI-powered resume analysis platform with intelligent job matching

aiAnalysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Advanced ML/NLP techniques for intelligent resume parsing and error detection

errorDetection.title: Error Detection
errorDetection.description: Identify grammar issues, missing information, and structural problems instantly

jobMatching.title: Job Matching
jobMatching.description: Compare resumes against job vacancies with skill highlighting and experience verification

fastProcessing.title: Fast Processing
fastProcessing.description: Get comprehensive analysis results in seconds with our optimized pipeline

step1.title: Upload Resume
step1.description: Upload PDF or DOCX resume files through our intuitive interface

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: Our AI extracts skills, detects errors, and calculates experience

step3.title: Get Results
step3.description: Receive detailed analysis with recommendations and job matching

cta.title: Ready to analyze your first resume?
cta.subtitle: Get started in seconds with our easy-to-use interface

upload.title: Upload Resume
upload.subtitle: Upload your resume (PDF or DOCX) for AI-powered analysis and job matching.

uploader.clickToBrowse: Drag and drop your resume here, or click to browse
uploader.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your file...
uploader.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOCX â€¢ Maximum file size: {{maxSize}}MB

whatHappensNext.title: What happens next?
whatHappensNext.step1: 1. Our AI extracts skills, experience, and qualifications from your resume
whatHappensNext.step2: 2. We analyze your resume for common errors and improvement opportunities
whatHappensNext.step3: 3. You can compare your resume against job vacancies to see match percentage
whatHappensNext.timeline: The analysis typically takes 5-10 seconds. You'll be redirected automatically when complete.

loading.title: Analyzing resume...
loading.subtitle: This may take a few moments

noData.title: No Analysis Data
noData.message: No analysis results found for resume ID: {{id}}

allClear.title: Great Job!
allClear.message: No critical issues detected in your resume. Your resume looks well-structured and professional.

compare.title: Job Comparison Results
compare.noDataMessage: No comparison data found for resume ID: {{resumeId}} and vacancy ID: {{vacancyId}}
compare.matchedSkillsDescription: Candidate has {{count}} skill{{plural}} that match the vacancy requirements.
compare.missingSkillsDescription: Candidate is missing {{count}} skill{{plural}} from the vacancy requirements.
compare.strongCandidateMessage: This candidate matches {{percentage}}% of the required skills and has strong potential for the role. Consider proceeding with interviews.
compare.potentialCandidateMessage: This candidate matches {{percentage}}% of requirements. Review missing skills and experience gaps before proceeding.
compare.weakMatchMessage: This candidate only matches {{percentage}}% of requirements. Significant skill gaps exist. Consider other candidates.

adminSynonyms.title: Custom Synonyms Management
adminSynonyms.subtitle: Manage organization-specific custom skill synonym mappings to improve matching accuracy.
adminSynonyms.noSynonymsMessage: Get started by adding your first custom synonym entry for this organization.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete the custom synonym entry for '{{skill}}'?

dialog.customSynonymsHelper: Enter multiple synonyms separated by commas
dialog.atLeastOneError: At least one custom synonym is required

adminAnalytics.title: Feedback Analytics Dashboard
adminAnalytics.subtitle: Monitor match accuracy, learning progress, and model performance metrics
adminAnalytics.loadingMessage: This may take a few moments

learningProgress.title: Learning Progress
learningProgress.statusNoData: No feedback data yet. Start collecting recruiter feedback to enable continuous learning.
learningProgress.statusPending: {{count}} feedback entries pending ML pipeline processing. Learning in progress...
learningProgress.statusComplete: All feedback has been processed. Model is up to date with latest recruiter corrections.

models.title: Model Versions
models.noModelsMessage: No model versions found. Model versioning will be available after the first training cycle.
models.noActiveModelMessage: {{count}} model version(s) found, but none are currently active as production. Activate a model version to use it for matching.

feedback.title: Recent Feedback
feedback.noFeedbackMessage: No feedback entries found. Start collecting recruiter feedback to populate this dashboard.

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.failedToFetch: Failed to fetch data. Please try again.
errors.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds {{maxSize}}MB limit. Please choose a smaller file.
errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload {{fileTypes}} files only.
errors.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validationError: Validation error. Please check your input.
